sp.p:
take the Greeks. Do you think that Greek
art ever tells us what the Greek
people are like? Do you believe that the Athenian women were like the stately
dignified figures of the Parthenon
frieze, or like those marvellous
goddesses that sit in the triangular pediment? who sat in the triangular pediments of the same building If you
judge from the art they certainly were so.
